titleStmt.title: The rights of the crovvn of England, as it is established by law. / Written in the time of the late King, by Edward Bagshaw Esquire, an apprentice of the common-law.
titleStmt.author: Bagshaw, Edward, d. 1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. for Simon Miller at the Starre in St Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With preliminary and final blank leaves.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Starre in St Pauls Church-yard
